meanings.definition: The ability of an organism to regulate its body temperature internally.
meanings.sent1: Endothermies help animals stay warm in cold weather.
meanings.sent2: Mammals and birds are known for their endothermies.
meanings.sent3: The endothermies of the polar bear keep it cozy even in icy conditions.
meanings.sent4: The endothermies of a furnace keep the house warm during winter.
meanings.sent5: The endothermies of a cozy blanket make it perfect for chilly nights.

meanings.sent1: Endothermies allow animals to maintain a constant body temperature.
meanings.sent2: Endothermies are essential for animals like humans and dogs.
meanings.sent3: The endothermies of a dog make it a great cuddle buddy on cold nights.
meanings.sent4: In a world of endothermies, humans stand out with their diverse abilities.
meanings.sent5: The endothermies of a hot cup of cocoa bring comfort on a winter day.

meanings.definition: The process of generating heat internally.
meanings.sent1: Endothermies help animals produce warmth from within.
meanings.sent2: The endothermies of a lizard help it stay active in cool environments.
meanings.sent3: The endothermies of a cozy fire create a welcoming atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: In a cold room, the endothermies of a heater are much appreciated.
meanings.sent5: The endothermies of exercise make you feel warm and energized.
